title: Helping Early Voters with Rejected Ballots?
selftext:
This might be a dumb question, but I'm wondering if anyone knows of a way that one could volunteer to help voters who might have voted early but had their ballots rejected due to onerous voting laws ("naked" ballots, signature mismatch, etc.).  

Or some way to help make sure that folks whose ballots were rejected at least get alerted in time so that they can successfully submit a new ballot?
